Vacancy.Title: Vacancy
Vacancy.Text: If you are passionate about music, have experience and desire to teach and create, and want to join our team, please fill out our application form.

List.Text: Learning happens in a friendly atmosphere ‚Äî driven by passion for music, not obligation.

List.Title: No Limits
List.Text: Lessons available for both adults and children.

Story.Title: Our story
Story.Description: It all started with a love of music and a desire to teach others. After returning from studying in Poland and working in China, I wanted to share the experience I had gained there and be useful in my hometown of Rivne.

FullStory.Paragraph1: It all started with online vocal lessons during the pandemic, then moved offline, and later piano lessons and cooperation with another teacher were added. There were many people interested. That‚Äôs how the idea to expand was born ‚Äî so that everyone who wants to make music can do it. My dream was supported by Maksym Vorozhko and Oleksii Karchevskyi, who joined me on this journey.
FullStory.Paragraph2: We spent a year building the studio. We put a lot of work and effort into making it a comfortable space for students to engage in music. We wanted them to feel no worse than abroad and to be proud that in Rivne, too, things can be modern. And it‚Äôs not only about the space and equipment, but also about our approach to music education.
FullStory.Paragraph3: Later, we decided to create a place that would unite talented and creative people even more. 'Soul Place' is a space for our students‚Äô performances and various creative events aimed at developing the musical culture of Rivne.

List.Title: What is the price?
List.Content: You can find our prices in the 'Prices' section.

List.Title: Do you work with adults?
List.Content:
Of course! :)

We work with students from 1 to 103 years old. But if you‚Äôre 105, still feel free to reach out!

List.Title: Can I attend a lesson with a small child?
List.Content:
Yes, with administration approval.

However, keep in mind that lesson quality may vary under these conditions üôè

List.Title: Where is the studio located?
List.Content: The studio is located in Rivne, near the brewery district.

List.Title: Do you teach beginners?
List.Content: Yes, we work with students at all levels. The main things are having the desire and knowing what you want to work on.

List.Title: Can parents be present at a child‚Äôs lesson?
List.Content:
Yes, absolutely!

You know your child best, and if it makes them comfortable, we support it :)

However, we recommend letting the child work independently with the teacher, as

it often helps them focus better on the lesson.

List.Title: Do I need an instrument to attend lessons?
List.Content:
For piano and guitar, no‚Äîyou can start with our instruments.

For effective practice outside of lessons, having your own instrument is ideal as it speeds up progress.

With vocals, you already have your instrument üòÅ

For flute and recorder, your own instrument is needed. You can also rent a room by the hour to practice piano or sing into a microphone without worrying about disturbing anyone.

List.Title: What should I bring to the first lesson?
List.Content: Bring yourself, a positive attitude, and an idea of what you‚Äôd like to achieve. Prepare a goal and, if possible, 3-5 songs you‚Äôd like to play or sing.

List.Title: Is there an option to sign up online?
List.Content: Yes, we offer online sign-up‚Äîjust <link>click here</link>

List.Title: Can I try lessons with different teachers?
List.Content:
Yes, of course! All our teachers are great, but connecting with the right teacher is key.

To ensure the most comfortable experience, feel free to try lessons with a couple of teachers to find the best fit üíõ
